page.title: 08FELTONIAN CLUB
page.content: THE FELTONIAN CLUB WAS FOUNDED ABOUT 10 YEARS AGO BY MRS.BETTY PEARCE AND OTHERS.MR.EWART PRICE IS THE PRESENT CHAIRMAN,MR.FRED BAYLISS THE TREASURER AND MRS.E.JONES THE SECRETARY.IT MEETS EVERY TUESDAY IN THE METHODIST CHAPEL SUNDAY SCHOOL ROOM AND BEGINS WITH WHIST AND DOMINOES.THEN TEA AND BISCUITS ARE SERVED FOLLOWED BY 5 GAMES OF BINGO.AN ENTRANCE CHARGE OF 10P PER WEEK IS MADE,MEMBERS BRING DRAW PRIZES AND TICKETS ARE SOLD AT 5P EACH.THERE ARE USUALLY 2 DAY OUTINGS AND 2 AFTERNOON OUTINGS IN THE SUMMER AND A FREE ANNUAL CHRISTMAS DINNER IN A HOTEL OR RESTAURANT.ONCE A YEAR A COFFEE MORNING IS HELD TO RAISE FUNDS AND MR.& MRS. HORTON SELL WOULD AND GIVE A PERCENTAGE OF THE PROFITS TO THE CLUB.CHILDREN FROM THE SCHOOL COME TO ENTERTAIN EACH CHRISTMAS.
